Properties.ProtectedString:
local MOUSE_ICON = 'rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png' local RELOADING_ICON = 'rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png'
local Tool = script.Parent
local Mouse = nil
local function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and MOUSE_ICON or RELOADING_ICON end end
local function OnEquipped(mouse) Mouse = mouse UpdateIcon() end
local function OnChanged(property) if property == 'Enabled' then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:connect(OnChanged)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
StaffSlash = Tool:WaitForChild("StaffSlash") StaffGrip = Tool:WaitForChild("StaffGrip")
SlashSound = Handle:WaitForChild("SlashSound")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
Equipped = false SpecialReady = true SpecialActive = false
SlashDamage = 15 FireDamage = 10 ReloadTime = 1 SpecialReloadTime = 15
function RayCast(Position, Direction, MaxDistance, IgnoreList) return game:GetService("Workspace"):FindPartOnRayWithIgnoreList(Ray.new(Position, Direction.unit * (MaxDistance or 999.999)), IgnoreList) end
function FindCharacterAncestor(Parent) if Parent and Parent ~= game:GetService("Workspace") then local humanoid = Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid then return Parent, humanoid else return FindCharacterAncestor(Parent.Parent) end end return nil end
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local Creator_Tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator_Tag.Name = "creator" Creator_Tag.Value = player Debris:AddItem(Creator_Tag, 2) Creator_Tag.Parent = humanoid end
function UntagHumanoid(humanoid) for i, v in pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
function Blow(Hit) if Hit and Hit.Parent then local character, humanoid = FindCharacterAncestor(Hit.Parent) if character and character ~= Character and humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 and Humanoid.Health > 0 then local right_arm = Character:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") if right_arm then local joint = right_arm:FindFirstChild("RightGrip") if joint and (joint.Part0 == Handle or joint.Part1 == Handle) then UntagHumanoid(humanoid) TagHumanoid(humanoid, Player) humanoid:TakeDamage(SlashDamage) end end end end end
function Activated() if Tool.Enabled and not SpecialActive then Tool.Enabled = false StaffSlashAnim = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(StaffSlash) if StaffSlashAnim then SlashSound:Play() StaffSlashAnim:Play() end wait(ReloadTime) Tool.Enabled = true end end
function Equipped(Mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") Torso = Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") if not Character or not Humanoid or not Torso then return end Equipped = true if not Tool.Enabled then wait(ReloadTime) Tool.Enabled = true end Spawn(function() if not SpecialReady then wait(SpecialReloadTime) SpecialReady = true end end) Mouse.KeyDown:connect(function(Key) Key = Key:lower() if Key == "q" then if SpecialReady and not SpecialActive then Spawn(function() SpecialReady = false SpecialActive = true Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 0 if Equipped then StaffGripAnim = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(StaffGrip) if StaffGripAnim then StaffGripAnim:Play() end local TorsoPos = Torso.CFrame for i = 1, 125 do if Equipped then local Position = TorsoPos + TorsoPos.lookVector * (i + 4) local Hit, Pos = RayCast(Position.p, Vector3.new(0, -1, 0), 6, {Character}) if Hit then local Part = Instance.new("Part") Part.Name = "FlamePart" Part.Anchored = true Part.CanCollide = false Part.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Part.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Part.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom Part.Size = Vector3.new(2, 2, 2) Part.Transparency = 1 local Fire = Instance.new("Fire") Fire.Color = Color3.new((85 / 255), (0 / 255), (127 / 255)) Fire.SecondaryColor = Color3.new((85 / 255), (0 / 255), (255 / 255)) Fire.Heat = 25 Fire.Size = 5 Fire.Enabled = true Fire.Parent = Part Debris:AddItem(Part, 10) Part.Touched:connect(function(Hit) if Hit and Hit.Parent then local character, humanoid = FindCharacterAncestor(Hit.Parent) if character and character ~= Character and humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 and Humanoid.Health > 0 then UntagHumanoid(humanoid) TagHumanoid(humanoid, Player) humanoid:TakeDamage(FireDamage) end end end) Part.Parent = Character Part.CFrame = CFrame.new(Pos) - Vector3.new(0, Part.Size.Y, 0) Spawn(function() for i = 0.1, Part.Size.Y, 0.1 do Part.CFrame = Part.CFrame + Vector3.new(0, 0.1, 0) wait() end end) wait(0.025) end else break end end wait(1.5) if StaffGripAnim then StaffGripAnim:Stop() end Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 SpecialActive = false wait(SpecialReloadTime) SpecialReady = true end end) end end end) end
function Unequipped() Equipped = false SpecialActive = false Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 if StaffSlashAnim then StaffSlashAnim:Stop() end if StaffGripAnim then StaffGripAnim:Stop() end end
Handle.Touched:connect(Blow)
Tool.Activated:connect(Activated) Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)
